message: Guarantee D (Network Egress Allowlist) is PARTIAL: Allowlist file exists and Gate N passes, but runtime network enforcement is not implemented. Network clients (telemetry, commit service, LLM API, GitHub API) do not validate destinations against config/network_allowlist.yaml before making requests.
suggested_fix:
Implement runtime network enforcement:
1. Create src/launch/util/network_policy.py with validate_host() function
2. Update all network clients to call validate_host() before requests:
   - src/launch/clients/telemetry.py
   - src/launch/clients/commit_service.py
   - src/launch/clients/llm_client.py (if exists)
   - src/launch/clients/github_client.py (if exists)
3. Raise PolicyViolationError if host not in allowlist
4. Add comprehensive tests in tests/unit/util/test_network_policy.py
5. Update Gate N to verify runtime integration (not just file existence)
